languages.text: {n}...странная безделушка из необычного материала. Разглядев ее получше, вы понимаете, что она сделала из призрачной кости. Кажется, Ирлиэт недосчитается одной из подвесок со своего оружия.{/n}
{n}...a strange bauble made from an unusual substance. After getting a better look, you recognise the material as wraithbone. It looks like Yrliet may now be one weapon ornament short.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...странная безделушка из необычного материала. Разглядев ее получше, вы понимаете, что она сделала из призрачной кости. Кажется, Ирлиэт недосчитается одной из подвесок со своего оружия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}...a strange curio made from an unusual material. After getting a better look, you recognise the material as wraithbone. It looks like Yrliet may now be one weapon ornament short.{/n}
{n}...a strange curio made from an unusual material. After getting a better look, you recognise the material as wraithbone. It looks like Yrliet may now be one weapon ornament short.{/n}
{n}...a strange bauble made from an unusual substance. After getting a better look, you recognise the material as wraithbone. It looks like Yrliet may now be one weapon ornament short.{/n}
{n}...a strange bauble made from an unusual substance. After getting a better look, you recognise the material as wraithbone. It looks like Yrliet may now be one weapon ornament short.{/n}
{n}...a strange bauble made from an unusual substance. After getting a better look, you recognise the material as wraithbone. It looks like Yrliet may now be one weapon ornament short.{/n}
{n}...a strange bauble made from an unusual substance. After getting a better look, you recognise the material as wraithbone. It looks like Yrliet may now be one weapon ornament short.{/n}

languages.text: {n}…珍しい素材から作られた奇怪な装飾品だ。よく見てみると、それが幽骨で作られていることがわかった。ユリエットの武器から、装飾品のひとつがなくなってしまったようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a strange bauble made from an unusual substance. After getting a better look, you recognise the material as wraithbone. It looks like Yrliet may now be one weapon ornament short.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}…珍しい素材から作られた奇怪な装飾品だ。よく見てみると、それが幽骨で作られていることがわかった。ユリエットの武器から、装飾品のひとつがなくなってしまったようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}... eine seltsame Kugel aus einem ungewöhnlichen Material. Nach einem genaueren Blick identifizierst du es als Phantomkristall. Sieh aus, als hätte Yrliet jetzt eine Waffenverzierung weniger.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a strange bauble made from an unusual substance. After getting a better look, you recognise the material as wraithbone. It looks like Yrliet may now be one weapon ornament short.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... eine seltsame Kugel aus einem ungewöhnlichen Material. Nach einem genaueren Blick identifizierst du es als Phantomkristall. Sieh aus, als hätte Yrliet jetzt eine Waffenverzierung weniger.{/n}

languages.text: {n}... un bibelot taillé dans une substance inhabituelle. En l'observant de plus près, vous comprenez qu'il s'agit de moelle spectrale. Il semblerait qu'une arme d'Yrliet ait été allégée de l'un de ses ornements.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a strange bauble made from an unusual substance. After getting a better look, you recognise the material as wraithbone. It looks like Yrliet may now be one weapon ornament short.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... un bibelot taillé dans une substance inhabituelle. En l'observant de plus près, vous comprenez qu'il s'agit de moelle spectrale. Il semblerait qu'une arme d'Yrliet ait été allégée de l'un de ses ornements.{/n}

languages.text: {n}... un extraño abalorio hecho de un material inusual. Tras examinarlo más de cerca, reconoces que se trata de hueso espectral. Parece que Yrliet se ha quedado sin uno de los ornamentos de sus armas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a strange bauble made from an unusual substance. After getting a better look, you recognise the material as wraithbone. It looks like Yrliet may now be one weapon ornament short.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... un extraño abalorio hecho de un material inusual. Tras examinarlo más de cerca, reconoces que se trata de hueso espectral. Parece que Yrliet se ha quedado sin uno de los ornamentos de sus armas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}……那是某种由不同寻常的物质制成的古怪饰品。你仔细观察之后，才认出来那原来是灵骨。此时此刻，伊莉耶特的武器上恐怕少了一件饰品。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a strange bauble made from an unusual substance. After getting a better look, you recognise the material as wraithbone. It looks like Yrliet may now be one weapon ornament short.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}……那是某种由不同寻常的物质制成的古怪饰品。你仔细观察之后，才认出来那原来是灵骨。此时此刻，伊莉耶特的武器上恐怕少了一件饰品。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sıra dışı bir malzemeden yapılmış tuhaf bir biblo. İyice inceledikten sonra tayfkemikten yapıldığını anlıyorsun. Görünen o ki Yrliet'in silahından bir süs eksilmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...a strange bauble made from an unusual substance. After getting a better look, you recognise the material as wraithbone. It looks like Yrliet may now be one weapon ornament short.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sıra dışı bir malzemeden yapılmış tuhaf bir biblo. İyice inceledikten sonra tayfkemikten yapıldığını anlıyorsun. Görünen o ki Yrliet'in silahından bir süs eksilmiş.{/n}
